title: Dragon Age: Inquisition sucks
body: So I was playing it right, and the guys you can have relations with are ugly, one is like this bull thing and the other is a flamboyant french man with a crap haircut. And theirs no mods to make them look decent, I just want my party to be sexy as hell, and omg.. ffs.

replies.body: you can romance nearly everyone. except frenchie he is the "worlds first openly gay character" or you could ... you know...

> you can romance nearly everyone. except frenchie he is the "worlds first openly gay character" or you could ... you know...

My first play through is always a gay human, then a lesbian female then something else.

So you're surprised that two of the four major races (One of which is supposed to look like a giant tank of a creature and the other, I'm assuming, from the %%%%ing French county of the game) are the romantic interests and that they aren't exactly looking their best at the end of the world?

Also, spoilers pls.
